368	Within	O
368	the	O
368	framework	O
368	of	O
368	that	O
368	protocol	O
368	,	O
368	Belgium	O
368	must	S-modal
368	reduce	O
368	its	O
368	greenhouse	O
368	gas	O
368	emissions	O
368	by	O
368	7.5	O
368	percent	O
368	,	O
368	compared	O
368	to	O
368	1990	O
368	,	O
368	in	O
368	the	O
368	2008-2012	O
368	period	O
368	.	O

369	Following	O
369	the	O
369	formal	O
369	ratification	O
369	of	O
369	the	O
369	Kyoto	O
369	protocol	O
369	by	O
369	all	O
369	the	O
369	parliaments	O
369	of	O
369	the	O
369	concerned	O
369	countries	O
369	,	O
369	that	O
369	protocol	O
369	will	O
369	become	O
369	equivalent	O
369	to	O
369	a	O
369	Belgian	O
369	law	O
369	.	O

370	We	O
370	readily	O
370	accept	O
370	that	O
370	there	O
370	are	O
370	good	S-modal
370	intentions	O
370	on	O
370	the	O
370	part	O
370	of	O
370	both	O
370	the	O
370	government	O
370	and	O
370	this	O
370	country	O
370	's	O
370	various	O
370	sectors	O
370	to	O
370	comply	O
370	with	O
370	the	O
370	Kyoto	O
370	standards	O
370	.	O

371	Because	O
371	this	O
371	debate	O
371	has	O
371	failed	O
371	to	O
371	take	O
371	place	O
371	,	O
371	it	O
371	is	O
371	understandable	S-modal
371	that	O
371	all	O
371	sectors	O
371	(	O
371	ranging	O
371	from	O
371	processing	O
371	and	O
371	manufacturing	O

371	and	O

371	the	O
371	residential	O
371	sector	O
371	)	O
371	are	O
371	currently	O
371	doing	O
371	their	O
371	utmost	O
371	to	O
371	make	O
371	their	O
371	own	O
371	future	O
371	efforts	O
371	as	O
371	small	O
371	(	O
371	yet	O
371	acceptable	S-modal
371	)	O
371	as	O
371	possible	S-modal
371	.	O

372	That	O
372	is	O
372	strikingly	O
372	illustrated	O
372	by	O
372	Belgian	O
372	large-scale	O
372	industry	O
372	,	O
372	which	O
372	has	O
372	made	O
372	great	O
372	efforts	O
372	over	O
372	the	O
372	past	O
372	10	O
372	years	O
372	,	O
372	over	O
372	which	O
372	energy	O
372	intensity	O
372	(	O
372	energy	O
372	use	O
372	per	O
372	unit	O
372	of	O
372	final	O
372	product	O
372	)	O
372	has	O
372	improved	O
372	considerably	O
372	.	O

373	But	O
373	a	O
373	very	O
373	considerable	O
373	increase	O
373	in	O
373	production	O
373	is	O
373	expected	S-modal
373	in	O
373	Belgium	O
373	over	O
373	the	O
373	next	O
373	10	O
373	years	O
373	,	O
373	so	O
373	that	O
373	(	O
373	even	O
373	with	O
373	very	O
373	efficient	O
373	processes	O
373	)	O
373	overall	O
373	carbon	O
373	dioxide	O
373	emissions	O
373	will	O
373	certainly	S-modal
373	rise	O
373	.	O

374	In	O
374	a	O
374	nutshell	O
374	,	O
374	benchmarking	O
374	means	O
374	that	O
374	companies	O
374	compare	O
374	their	O
374	energy	O
374	efficiency	O
374	with	O
374	that	O
374	of	O
374	similar	O
374	plants	O
374	abroad	O
374	.	O

375	In	O
375	these	O
375	covenants	O
375	,	O
375	the	O
375	companies	O
375	pledge	O
375	to	O
375	rank	O
375	among	O
375	the	O
375	world	O
375	leaders	O
375	in	O
375	energy	O
375	efficiency	O
375	by	O
375	2012	O
375	.	O

376	In	O
376	return	O
376	for	O
376	their	O
376	commitment	O
376	,	O
376	they	O
376	are	O
376	exempted	O
376	from	O
376	additional	O
376	(	O
376	Flemish	O
376	)	O
376	emission	O
376	restrictions	O
376	,	O
376	taxes	O
376	on	O
376	emissions	O
376	,	O
376	or	O
376	negotiable	O
376	emission	O
376	rights	O
376	.	O

377	Belgian	O
377	industry	O
377	is	O
377	advocating	O
377	benchmark	O
377	covenants	O
377	because	O
377	it	O
377	is	O
377	afraid	O
377	that	O
377	an	O
377	absolute	O
377	limit	O
377	would	S-modal
377	weaken	O
377	considerably	O
377	its	O
377	competitive	O
377	position	O
377	with	O
377	respect	O
377	to	O
377	similar	O
377	companies	O
377	in	O
377	regions	O
377	where	O

377	Kyoto	O
377	protocol	O
377	is	O

378	Those	O
378	covenants	O
378	contain	O
378	insufficient	S-modal

378	Belgian/Flemish	O
378	reduction	O

379	To	O
